Node.Notes: Uncertain. While in meaning this clause serves to reinforce abiding in us, it cannot be conjoined to the participial clause. So, it is necessary to separate it out and conjoin to the main clause.
Instrument (probable conclusion from real world knowledge)
Assumes "but [as writing that] which we had from the beginning."
Gives reason for preceding exhortations. Assumes: [I write/ask these things] because ...
